nodes.text: A corporation operated in around the year 3643 BBY. They discovered a cure to the deadly C5H4 virus but refused to release it to the public. A diplomat met with the corporation to negotiate the cure's purchase so they could release it.
The corporation was first mentioned as part of the diplomacy crew skills mission "A Cure for What Ails You" in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic.
